sentences.sContent: The boy court the girl greatly, but the orgulous girl could not make up her mind because she could not validate his promises.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy court the girl greatly, but the orgulous girl could not make up her mind because she could not validate his promises.
sentences.sCn: 男孩在女孩面前不断大献殷勤，但是出色而又骄傲的女孩始终下不了最后的决心，因为她无法验证他千百次的承诺。
